title: Spellbook of enchant armor
data:
| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   enchant armor   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                                                    |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                   | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance")                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                    |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                   | 700 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                  |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                       | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                        |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                                | 56                                                                                 |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                                 | [35–69](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                    |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                                   | [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment_spells "Enchantment spells")                       |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                        | 7                                                                                  |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                                   | 35 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                                       |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                                    | non-directional                                                                    |
| Equivalent                                                                                                                                                                   | [scroll of enchant armor](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_armor "Scroll of enchant armor") |

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), the **spellbook of enchant armor** can be read to learn the **spell of enchant armor** spell. It is a level 7 [enchantment spell](/wiki/Enchantment_spell "Enchantment spell"), and the spellbook takes roughly 56 turns to read if successfully learning the spell.

## Description

When cast, the spell has a chance of acting as an uncursed [scroll of enchant armor](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_armor "Scroll of enchant armor") that is based on [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill") level: 1 in 14 at Unskilled, 1 in 12 at Basic, 1 in 10 at Skilled, and 1 in 8 at Expert.

## Strategy

Like the [spellbook of enchant weapon](/wiki/Spellbook_of_enchant_weapon "Spellbook of enchant weapon"), this spell is generally not that useful for its level: most non-casting roles can expect to have to cast the spell dozens of time before even getting one point of enchantment, inducing a large amount of [spell hunger](/wiki/Spell_hunger "Spell hunger") and using up several turns in the process. The spell also enchants armor at random as with the scroll, requiring you to remove all other armor beyond the target item before each cast - at minimum, you will also have to remove any armor that is already at its safe maximum or risk having it evaporate.

[Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") might use it to save a few charges off their magic markers, although by the time they can cast the spell they are likely to have a good deal of their ascension kit together and enchanted already. Since the spell cannot give the effect of a blessed scroll, an actual scroll will generally be required for the final enchantment anyway.

However, this spell is probably useful for players attempting [conducts](/wiki/Conduct "Conduct").

## See also

- [Spellbook of enchant weapon](/wiki/Spellbook_of_enchant_weapon "Spellbook of enchant weapon")
- [List of SLASH'EM spellbooks](/wiki/Spellcasting_\(SLASH%27EM\)#SLASH.27EM_spellbooks "Spellcasting (SLASH'EM)")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Spellbook of enchant armor

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
spellbook of
+   enchant armor  
Appearance random
Base price 700 zm
Weight 50
Turns to read 56
Ink to write 35–69
Spell type enchantment
Level 7
Power cost 35 Pw
Direction non-directional
Equivalent scroll of enchant armor

In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, the spellbook of enchant armor can be read to learn the spell of enchant armor spell. It is a level 7 enchantment spell, and the spellbook takes roughly 56 turns to read if successfully learning the spell.

Description

When cast, the spell has a chance of acting as an uncursed scroll of enchant armor that is based on skill level: 1 in 14 at Unskilled, 1 in 12 at Basic, 1 in 10 at Skilled, and 1 in 8 at Expert.

Strategy

Like the spellbook of enchant weapon, this spell is generally not that useful for its level: most non-casting roles can expect to have to cast the spell dozens of time before even getting one point of enchantment, inducing a large amount of spell hunger and using up several turns in the process. The spell also enchants armor at random as with the scroll, requiring you to remove all other armor beyond the target item before each cast - at minimum, you will also have to remove any armor that is already at its safe maximum or risk having it evaporate.

Wizards might use it to save a few charges off their magic markers, although by the time they can cast the spell they are likely to have a good deal of their ascension kit together and enchanted already. Since the spell cannot give the effect of a blessed scroll, an actual scroll will generally be required for the final enchantment anyway.

However, this spell is probably useful for players attempting conducts.

See also

  • Spellbook of enchant weapon
  • List of SLASH'EM spellbooks

In [[SLASH'EM]] and [[SlashTHEM]], the '''spellbook of enchant armor''' can be read to learn the '''spell of enchant armor''' spell. It is a level 7 [[enchantment spell]], and the spellbook takes roughly 56 turns to read if successfully learning the spell.

==Description==
When cast, the spell has a chance of acting as an uncursed [[scroll of enchant armor]] that is based on [[skill]] level: 1 in 14 at Unskilled, 1 in 12 at Basic, 1 in 10 at Skilled, and 1 in 8 at Expert.

==Strategy==
Like the [[spellbook of enchant weapon]], this spell is generally not that useful for its level: most non-casting roles can expect to have to cast the spell dozens of time before even getting one point of enchantment, inducing a large amount of [[spell hunger]] and using up several turns in the process. The spell also enchants armor at random as with the scroll, requiring you to remove all other armor beyond the target item before each cast - at minimum, you will also have to remove any armor that is already at its safe maximum or risk having it evaporate.

[[Wizard]]s might use it to save a few charges off their magic markers, although by the time they can cast the spell they are likely to have a good deal of their ascension kit together and enchanted already. Since the spell cannot give the effect of a blessed scroll, an actual scroll will generally be required for the final enchantment anyway.

However, this spell is probably useful for players attempting [[conduct]]s.<!--...what conducts?-->
